1370: Alwin moved to Marcktgang.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Itsburgis at age 22 in 1370.
Had a son with Itsburgis, Tielen, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Itsburgis, Alretieren, at age 25.
Lost son Tielen when Tielen was 4 years old.
1374: Had a son with Itsburgis, Iacobus, at age 26.
1375: Had a daughter with Itsburgis, Wendelmodis, at age 27.
1376: Had a daughter with Itsburgis, Sarre, at age 28.
1377: Had a son with Itsburgis, Walwin, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Itsburgis, Ghodelde, at age 30.
1379: Had a son with Itsburgis, Menzone, at age 31.
1381: Lost son Menzone when Menzone was 3 years old.
